title: Stephen Colbert Blasts Donald Trump For Calling Meryl Streep "Over-Rated"

text:
Stephen Colbert Talks Donald Trump's Meryl Streep Tweets Stephen Colbert Blasts Donald Trump For Calling Meryl Streep "Over-Rated" January 9, 2017 by Monica Sisavat 198 Shares 
Stephen Colbert has had it with Donald Trump . On Monday, the late-night host used his monologue to respond to the president-elect's recent comments about nine-time Golden Globe winner Meryl Streep . Following Meryl's passionate speech at the ceremony , Trump went on a Twitter rant and called her "one of the most over-rated actresses." This, of course, did not sit well with Stephen, who blasted Trump on his show, saying, "Wait a second, I'm sorry, what? Meryl Streep , overrated? Have you seen Sophie's Choice ? Have you seen The French Lieutenant's Woman ?" Stephen then shouted, "No! Too far!" Watch the entire thing go down above. Related:
